characters.name: Dr. Whizzy
characters.voice_description: Deep and authoritative with a subtle playful tone
characters.visual_description: A cartoonish doctor with messy hair, glasses slipping down the nose, a white lab coat over a Hawaiian shirt, stethoscope around his neck, and mismatched socks.

characters.name: Sassy Sally
characters.voice_description: High-pitched and bubbly with a touch of sarcasm
characters.visual_description: A lively fitness instructor with a ponytail, yoga pants with neon patterns, a tank top that says 'Namastay Cool,' and a yoga mat strapped to her back.

characters.name: Lazy Larry
characters.voice_description: Grumbly and slow, with exaggerated whining tones
characters.visual_description: A scruffy guy in pajama pants, a 'Snooze Champion' t-shirt, holding a donut and a half-empty coffee cup, slouching noticeably.

scenes.title: The Yoga Revelation
scenes.background: A bright yoga studio with mats rolled out, potted plants in the corners, and a chalkboard with the phrase 'Breathe and Believe.'

dialogues.dialogue: Welcome to the cosmic event of the century: Larry's first-ever yoga class.

dialogues.name: Lazy Larry
dialogues.dialogue: Why am I here? I thought yoga was just fancy stretching?

dialogues.name: Sassy Sally
dialogues.dialogue: Fancy stretching? Oh Larry, bless your sedentary soul! Yoga is the ancient art of NOT becoming a real-life potato.

dialogues.name: Dr. Whizzy
dialogues.dialogue: It balances mind, body, and spirit... and by spirit, I mean canceling out all the calories from donuts.

dialogues.name: Lazy Larry
dialogues.dialogue: Cancel calories?! Why didn't anyone tell me this before?!

scenes.display_text: Yoga: The ancient secret to a guilt-free life.

scenes.title: Stretch it or Wreck it
scenes.background: A scenic park with a sunrise, a group of people doing yoga outdoors, and birds chirping.

dialogues.name: Sassy Sally
dialogues.dialogue: See Larry, stretching helps your muscles relax and makes you less cranky. It's like therapy but cheaper—and with these cool poses!

dialogues.name: Lazy Larry
dialogues.dialogue: Cheaper would've been free. And what's the deal with the Cobra pose? Isn't slithering bad for my back?

dialogues.name: Sassy Sally
dialogues.dialogue: Oh honey, slithering is the least of your worries. We're trying to save you from becoming fossilized in that couch of yours!

dialogues.name: Lazy Larry
dialogues.dialogue: I guess becoming a couch fossil isn't ideal. Can I still have donuts though?

scenes.display_text: Stretch now, or face the wrath of the Stiffness Monster.

scenes.title: Doctor's Orders... Kinda
scenes.background: A cartoonish doctor's office with Dr. Whizzy’s diplomas hanging crookedly on the wall and jars labeled 'Health Stuff'.

dialogues.name: Dr. Whizzy
dialogues.dialogue: Larry, you don’t need to be a celery-munching health nut, but you could at least move your limbs once in a while. Doctors call it 'not letting gravity win.'

dialogues.name: Lazy Larry
dialogues.dialogue: I do move! I walked to the fridge this morning. Twice.

dialogues.name: Dr. Whizzy
dialogues.dialogue: Impressive. But let’s aim for big goals—like walking to the yoga studio without a donut in hand.

dialogues.name: Lazy Larry
dialogues.dialogue: Fine... but only if I can do yoga on a couch.

scenes.display_text: A little effort goes a long way (even if you start from the couch).
